actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-134.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of (H.R. 2614), a bill to authorize supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 1981 for procurement of aircraft, missiles, naval vessels, and tracked combat vehicles and for research, development, test, and evaluation for the Armed Forces and to increase the authorized personnel end strengths for military and civilian personnel of the Department of Defense for fiscal year 1981.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2614 (military funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of (H.R. 2614), a bill to authorize supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 1981 for procurement of aircraft, missiles, naval vessels, and tracked combat vehicles and for research, development, test, and evaluation for the Armed Forces and to increase the authorized personnel end strengths for military and civilian personnel of the Department of Defense for fiscal year 1981.
